title: Mexico : age distribution of internet users 2019
summary: In general Share of respondents has fallen over the Year.
Share of respondents is slightly increasing from 18-24_years to 25-34_years, slightly decreasing from 25-34_years to 35-44_years, and lastly roughly constant from 35-44_years to 6-11_years.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 25-34_years and 35-44_years.
The highest Share of respondents, of value 22.0 was reached at Year 25-34_years
Minimum Share of respondents about 12.0 was reached at Year 45-54_years, and 6-11_years
